But it does make people feel good.

I know I do when I get hackusated.

replies.body:
This is not appropriate for the forums.

Yes, hackusating is bad but taking screenshots of those people and posting them on the forums is even worse.

At the very least, blur the names out.

Yes, they shouldn't have done it but that gives you no right to publicly shame them for hundreds of people to see.

By posting these images and videos, you are making yourself no better than the people you choose to make fun of.
